titleStmt.title: Moses B. Maclay to James W. Tate
CWG2655

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives

creation.placeName: New York, New York County, New York

body.p:
New York
Jany 18/62
Hon.
James W. Tate
Asst Secy of State
Dear Sir,
I am obliged by your circular note of 7th Inst. that my Commission as a Comr of Deeds for Kentucky in New York would Expire on the 14th Instant.
My absense from the City for the past ten days precluded an early reply.
Enclosed find the fee on renewal five dollars.

You will greatly oblige if the Commission could be forwarded
on receipt hereof.

New York
Comr. of Deeds
M. B. Maclay
(City)
